item.title: Vimium for Google Chrome
item.description: For people who want to browse the web without using the mouse, I recommend getting Vimium extension for Google Chrome or Firefox. I’ve been using Vimium extension since May 4th, 2020, and it drastically improved my web browsing experience. If you are also thinking about changing from full-sized or 80% (ten keyless) keyboard to 60% or 40% keyboard, I recommend getting Vimium or a similiar type of extention since you’ll be operating with less keys.
